Title: Object: Jument égyptienne (Egyptian mare)
Series: Etudes de chevaux lithographiés
Description: In an elaborate saddle and bridle, held by a servant seen from behind, as he faces an elderly man seated on the ground smoking a pipe under a palm tree; another figure visible behind. 1822 Lithograph
Curator's comments: For information on the series, see 1868,1114.280.
Bibliographic references: Delteil / Le Peintre-Graveur Illustré (XIXe et XXe siècles) (57.II)
